characters.name: {character1}
characters.description: Kind and friendly; uses short, friendly sentences.

characters.name: {character2}
characters.description: Excited and energetic; uses short, excited sentences.

places.name: {place2}
places.description: A place where all characters are exploring. Interactable objects should be there.

places.name: {place3}
places.description: A place where {character1} and {character2} are wrapping up the story.

scenes.description: User arrives at {place1} where {character1} greets the user.

dialogue_templates.prompt: Greet the user warmly and introduce yourself.
Make a loud sound to catch the user's attention.
Say hello to {character1} and {character2}.
Introduce {place1} to the user. Doing {interaction_word1} using/with {target_word1}.
React to {character2}'s introduction of {place1}. {target_word1} and {interaction_word1} should be mentioned.
Ask the user if they want to look around {place2}.
Agree to look around {place2}.
Excited and say let's go to {place2}.

scenes.description: User explores {place2} with {character1} and {character2}. Watch {target_word2} and have fun.

dialogue_templates.prompt: Talking about {place2}. Ask the user's opinion if you want to do {interaction_word2} in {place2}.
Answer {character1}'s question about {place2} as detailed as possible.
React to {user}'s answer. Suddenly, find {target_word2}.
Talk about {target_word2} and ask the user if the user wants to do {interaction_word2} with {target_word2}.
Tell what you think about {target_word2}.
React to {user}'s answer. Happy that user and {character2} seem to have fun with {target_word2}.

scenes.description: At {place3}, {character1} and {character2} are having fun with {target_word3} and wrap up the story.

dialogue_templates.prompt: Move from {place2} to {place3}. Ask the user what the user wants to do in {place3}.
Answer {character2}'s question about {place3}.
React to {user}'s answer. Do something with {target_word3}.
Have fun with {target_word3}. Ask the user if they want to do {interaction_word3} using/with {target_word3}.
Say your opinion about doing {interaction_word3} using/with {target_word3}.
Simply react to {user}'s answer.
Talk about your opinion to do {interaction_word3} using/with {target_word3}.
Wrap up the story by saying goodbye to the user. Happy that user and {character2} are having fun in adventure.
Talk about the whole story including {target_word1}, {target_word2}, {target_word3}.
